text: Kamaghɨra gumazamizir kaba ian nɨghnɨzibagh asɨghasɨghasa me arazir kurar kabar gɨntɨsi. Me irebar kurabar garima da men nɨghnɨziba fema me arazir bar kurar mɨzɨrɨzibar uan mɨkarzibagh ami. Me Ekiamɨn akaba barazir puvatɨ, egha Godɨn Nguibamɨn itir enselɨn ekiaba uaghan akar kurabar me mɨgei.
